January 2011 10:01 AM I do love the pious attitude of the left on this subject, I remember a time when they were only to happy to jump into bed with Rupert Murdoch and the Sun! When Andy Coulson was editor of the NoW the paper purported to show George Osborne in a girls-and-cocaine situation, or so I have heard. Although this story was easily refuted, you would expect the future chancellor to be pretty miffed about it. And yet it is said that George Osborne himself suggested Andy Coulson as the Govt's director of communications. Amazing kind-heartedness on the part of a man not generally known for such qualities.
